channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IN

item.title: Report E-2024050031
item.description:
Report E-2024050031

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-07T15:13:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-25
  • City: Logansport
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Gardner Transport Services, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 271868
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Our truck was hauling a load of EAF dust from Nucor Crawfordsville, IN to deliver to WSP, Logansport, IN. He was traveling westbound on CR 225. Another truck traveling eastbound on CR 225 was driving in the center of the road and ran our driver off the road, and then left the scene of the accident. When our truck was run off the road, the truck and trailer overturned onto the passenger's side in a ditch. Upon contact with the ground, the trailer body split and the manways on the roof came open released EAF Dust onto the ground. *Included is a copy of the police report which includes a statement from a witness who saw it happen.
